塴字的基本解释

塴
bèng
把棺材放入墓穴：“司墓之室有当道者，毁之则朝而塴，弗毁则日中而塴。”

塴字的汉语字典释义

[①]［bèng］
［《廣韻》方隥切，去嶝，幫。］
亦作“塴1”。
葬时下棺于圹中。
[②]［péng］
［《廣韻》步崩切，平登，並。］
(1)箭垛子，箭靶。
(2)分水的堤坝。
(3)通“朋”。参见“堋2淫”。

塴字的康熙字典解释

【丑集中】【土字部】　塴； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页236第37
【集韻】同堋。又地名。湔塴江，在成都。【水經注】江水由湔塴江入郫江，撿江以行舟。

塴字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
塴字的起名意思

暂无。

塴
Basic explanation of words
塴
bèng
Put the coffin in the tomb: "There are those in charge in the room of the Si Tomb. If it is destroyed, it will be in the morning, and if it is destroyed, it will be in the middle of the day."
塴
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［bèng］
["Guang Yun" Fang Wei cut, go to Deng, help. ]
Also known as "塴1".
During the burial, the coffin was placed in the pit.
[②]［péng］
["Guangyun" collapsed step by step, flattened, and merged. ]
(1) Arrow duozi, archery target.
(2) The dike that divides the water.
(3) Through "Peng". See "堋2 lewdness".
塴
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Ugly Collection] [Tu Zi Department] 　塴; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Page Number: Page 236 Page 37
【Ji Yun】Same as Xing. Also place name. Mianlongjiang, in Chengdu. [Notes on Water Classics] The river flows from the Qianlong River to the Pixian River, picking up the river to move the boat.
